settings.content: Artos will be closed Thursday 11/28 and Friday 11/29 in observance of thanksgiving.
We work hard to make everyday bathroom fixtures stylish and readily available. If you have a project you would like to discuss just get in touch using the methods below.

settings.title: SHOWER SET SELECTOR
settings.heading: DESIGN YOUR LUXURY SHOWER SET
settings.content:
Your Artos Shower Set Selector makes it easy to find inspiration or bring your shower set vision to life. Simply click below to visualize a luxurious, affordable shower set for your choice of space.


Need help? Just ask.

settings.title: FREE PROJECT ADVICE
settings.heading: HELP FOR YOUR PROJECT
settings.content:
Our decorative fixture specialists will be proud to help you make the right choice, access spec and technical information or answer your questions. We’re here to help before, during or after your fixture is installed.


Need help? Just ask.

settings.title: STUNNING SATIN BRASS
settings.heading: EXPLORE SATIN BRASS FIXTURES
settings.content:
Artos satin brass fixtures bring a timeless, premium feel to any space. Plus, every fixture offers the tactile, sumptuous quality of US design combined with expert manufacturing. Every time.

Need help? Just ask.

settings.title: LUXURY FIXTURES 101
settings.content:
Our blog resource includes guides to fixtures types, help to understand essential terminology, simple steps to choose the right product and much much more.

Questions?
Just ask an Artos specialist. We’re here to help.

settings.subheading: Ready to Save. Ready to Go.

settings.quote: "From faucets to shower components to towel warmers they offer wonderful designs and solid fixtures."

"I am so impressed with the level of customer service you have provided, that Artos has provided.  It is so unusual these days to have a call answered by a live, knowledgeable person that can so efficiently and accurately provide information about a product. "

I really do appreciate the superior customer service you guys provide to me and my customers.  You all go above and beyond the call and for this I will always be a loyal customer!!  I am pushing a lot of my builders and plumbers into using more of your products.
Your fixtures made designing a breeze as they create a beautiful and powerful design effortlessly. Can't wait to use your fixtures in upcoming projects!

settings.content_title:
Need some help?
Get in touch.

settings.quote: I have nothing but praise for the people that work at Artos. Kaylee and the group working with her were very helpful and accomodating and with a lot of work on their part fixed my problem. Thank you very much for your excellent service!

Artos is one of our favorite brands to work with! Not only do they provide high quality products that are cost efficient, they also offer exceptional service in all aspects. Will definitely be continuing to build our relationship with Artos as we work on more projects!

Artos is our favorite line in the showroom. We get deliveries from Artos almost every day. If and when problems arise, it’s taken care of the same day and if it’s an emergency, they ship next day air to help us have a happy customer. Affordable and luxurious, it’s the most beautiful product out there!
I have been in the industry for over 18 years and Artos has the best customer service out there. They create elegant products that enrich my customers homes. Thank you Artos!

settings.title: Three Decades, Two Generations, One Passion
settings.content: Our founder, Peter Hill, began his 35 years of plumbing industry experience in Europe. Learning from the luxurious design innovators of Italy, Peter brought a passion for affordable yet opulent, tactile design to America in 2002. One generation later we’re still driven by his vision. Our ethos: US design know-how, from our family to your home.

settings.title: Inspired by Italy, Designed in America
settings.content:
We believe sumptuous, pacesetting design shouldn’t be unaffordable or inaccessible. That’s why we combine head-turning design with superb prices, a stunning product range and fast, free shipping from our own substantial inventory in Omaha, Nebraska.

Artos products are available through a range of nationwide dealers. Find a dealer and discover luxurious bathroom design at affordable prices.

settings.title: Quality Crafted Into Every Product
settings.content:
We’re proud of the network of high-quality producers we’re developed in Europe, India, Taiwan and the US across many years.

Every Artos fixture is then hand-assembled and tested in Omaha by our specialists.

The result?

Assured quality, every time.

Because we demand the highest standards of quality, value and business conduct from ourselves in everything we do, we’re proud to support the work and goals of the National Kitchen & Bath Association.

settings.title: Meet Our Decorative Plumbing Fixture Experts
settings.content:
Just like our 250 showroom (and rising) dealership network, our workplace family is growing faster than ever.
Meet the specialists who’ll support your dealership or project with pride...

settings.subheading: Book a meeting with a team member about your project.

settings.subheading: Get help from our award-winning customer care team.

settings.title: Call Us

settings.title: HOW CAN WE HELP?
settings.content: Thank you for using Artos Customer Support. We strive to continually increase the satisfaction our customer experience in working with us so your input is very important to us. Please fill out our contact form below. Our team will be back to you within 24 hours.

settings.title: find artos
settings.content: We are proudly based in Omaha, Nebraska, USA.

Every US-designed fixture is crafted in Europe, India and Taiwan then assembled & tested in Omaha

sumptuous options & finishes for every budget

Our passion?
Fixtures and prices designed to wow
